content: Heading toward the archway in the distance, you can find a green Wisp to absorb on the left side of the broken rock pathway, and on the right is a new type of enemy that will try to ambush you. This Pitstone is a mass of rock and skulls on legs, and will try to use its weight to jump down on you, and perform somersaults to use its momentum to slam into you. If they prove to be a problem to evade, consider using the Thrust Stance to charge up attacks from a distance and shatter them.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fright_Cliff_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Fright Cliff Walkthrough'.
The content is as follows:
Heading toward the archway in the distance, you can find a green Wisp to absorb on the left side of the broken rock pathway, and on the right is a new type of enemy that will try to ambush you. This Pitstone is a mass of rock and skulls on legs, and will try to use its weight to jump down on you, and perform somersaults to use its momentum to slam into you. If they prove to be a problem to evade, consider using the Thrust Stance to charge up attacks from a distance and shatter them.
